name: GunGun (its-terra)
description:
Instructions

1. *Hold* `R` and mouse-click all brown buttons to reload.
2. Red number is health, Black number is ammo.
3. Pick new guns from walls using `F`.
4. Enter doors to heal.
5. Survive & with the most kills.

Controls

WASD - movement.
R - keep holding to stay in reload mode.
F - pickup gun from wall.
Alt+F4 - exit game.
Tab - view gun stats.
    s= Seed of generate weapon
    fr= Fire Rate in bullets per minute
    dmg= Damage per bullet
    ammo= Max ammo

Credits

Made by its-terra.itch.io for LowRezJam 2019.

Sounds used are from freesound.org and made by
nioczkus
S_Dij
destron
tehlordoswag420
qubodup

 Invert mouse & Mouse sensitivity

Check out `settings.json` next to game exe file, change
values as you need.
